short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab with time and weather forecast

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Normal replaces original New Tab page with minimalistic dashboard featuring current date, time and weather forecast.

It requires geolocation permission to provide more accurate weather forecast.

Feel free to provide your feedback to andreyetumyancwsd@gmail.com.

CHANGELOG

# 1.1.0 2022-17-04
- "Now" card added
- a modal window with common settings added
- improvements related to forecast data loading
- internal optimizations

# 1.0.0 2022-12-02
- initial version
